column4: okay, the programs seem to be getting a "The error was 'BadAlloc (insufficient resources for operation)'" error message when i run them
The error was 'BadAlloc (insufficient resources for operation)' anyone know what this means?
what program?  Something that takes large amounts of ram?
Ahh, sounds like it's trying to allocate more than than is usable.
the memory is on my video card
from what I found, reinstall VLC
make sure you use apt-get remove and then reinstall it.  Reboot
